Message.Msg: I took you back off iggy... As to the more recent post above this one, all of the trapped longs had to wait for QE4EVER to continue because Amazon could have gone into freefall at any time. Someone (my guess is Cap'ns'Crew -- including the quants who piled in last Q4/Q1) is taking yet another run at the AAPLTrage rebalancing, but the relative valuation is just too out of line. It's that way across the board. All stocks can/should/will selloff. I look forward to someone doing forensic analysis on this scam someday. Cash is king, especially heading into a tightening cycle. AMZN is going to have to nagivate some tough waters. It'll be fascinating to hear how the underwriters and Scamalysts frame the story this time and what material omissions are made... Something tells me we can expect a wave of critically timed upgrades around the next offering...
